Topic.Title: Container Issues! (This is probably just me)

Posts.EditableText: Hey everyone. I was following the New person tutorial on the wiki when it asked me to make the FRIDGE a container. I followed the tutorial thoroughly and checked the issue 4 times... but every time I type "Open fridge" or click the name and then click open it says "You can't open it". As I said before I have gone through the tutorial a ton of times and nothing has worked. Here is the link to the tutorial I am talking about. http://quest5.net/wiki/Using_containers it's really frustrating as containers are clearly a major part of a Quest text adventure Sorry if I have wasted your time ~DKC1011

Sorry, I struggled with it for a little while and figured out it was because I never defined the verbs. Maybe you could make that a little more clear in the tutorial. To clear it up. I went into the verbs and defined "Open" where it said "print text" I changed that to "Run a script" in which I selected "Open an object" and changed the various settings.
Sorry again if I wasted your time
